article_title: Medicare To Cover Low-Dose CT Scans For Those At High Risk For Lung Cancer

article_metadata.author: Robert Glatter, MD

og.description: Lung cancer is recognized as the most deadly cancer in men and women in the US, leading to more deaths than breast, colon and pancreatic cancers combined. Nearly 160,000 Americans were projected to die from lung cancer in 2014, based on data from the American Lung Association (ALA). And the [...]
